promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a dynamic strong spider grass-type with a wooden crystal core. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or grass. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sprucewood, a dynamic strong spider grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: grass-whistle, wood-hammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word spider or grass or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, spider-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: The strong and nimble Sprucewood roams the forests. It uses its sonic whistle and powerful hammers to survive and thrive in its habitat.
